example.name: transitive
example.text: One group is the Committee on State Taxation , which [*T*-283] comprises 330 multistate corporations and advises the Council of State Chambers of Commerce .

example.name: passive
example.text: The FADA real-estate package , with an asking price of $ 428 million [*U*] , is comprised [*-1] of 150 properties in Texas , California , Colorado , Arizona and Florida .
